Searching .. @w1 Survival Tool detected nearby! @w2 Search the area around the Escape Pod, find and pick up the Survival Tool!

Integrated Data Assistant (IDA): @w1 . . @w1 <color=#00ff11>restarted</color>. @p2 Welcome back, Commander! @w2 Glad to see you alive! @w4 

We've had incredible luck! @w1 Being dragged into the TITAN's warp vortex and coming out alive in one piece! @w1 
I am currently trying to reestablish communication with the Operation Phoenix fleet. @w3

This will take a few minutes. @p9 In the meantime: @w1 I've been storing our sensor and event logs since our escape from Apollon station in the <color=#ffffff>Empyriopedia Journey Book</color> (<color=#00ff11>F1</color>). @w2

<color=#e1ff00>Please open the PDA  (</color><color=#00ff11>F1</color><color=#e1ff00>) to start synchronizing the data tables.  </color>
Français:
Assistant de données intégré (IDA): @w1 .. @w1 <color=#00ff11>redémarré</color>.@p2 Bienvenue commandant! @w2 Heureux de vous revoir vivant! @w4 

Nous avons eu une chance incroyable! @w1 Avoir été entraîné dans le vortex de distorsion du TITAN et en ressortir vivant en un seul morceau!! @w1 
Je tente de rétablir la communication avec la flotte de l'Opération Phoenix... @w3 Ça prendra quelques minutes. 

@p9 En attendant : 
@w1 Jai stocké les données et les journaux d'événements depuis notre évasion de la station Apollo dans le 
<color=#ffffff>JOURNAL DE BORD</color>.@w2

<color=#e1ff00>Ouvrez maintenant le PDA (</color><color=#00ff11>F1</color><color=#e1ff00>) pour commencer la synchronisation des bases de données.</color>

English:
Commander, the night is coming and you also need something to eat. @w2
I have analyzed the nearby plants. Most of them should be edible. @w1

First, collect some <color=#e1ff00>Plant Protein</color> and craft an <color=#e1ff00>Energy Bar</color>. @w1 

The recipe is available in your Survival Constructor in the status overview panel (<color=#00ff11>Tab</color>)
Français:
Commandant, la nuit arrive et vous avez aussi besoin de manger. @w2
J'ai analysé les plantes à proximité. La plupart doivent être comestibles. @w1

Tout d'abord, collectez des <color=#e1ff00>protéines végétales</color> et craftez une <color=#e1ff00>barre énergétique</color>. @w1 

Le modèle est disponible à partir de votre constructeur de survie dans votre inventaire (<color=#00ff11>TAB</color>)

English: <color=#00ffff>Defence</color> @w1\n\nUse this mode for defending against small animals. It is suggested that you walk around with Defense mode activated, as small spiders and insects may attack you.

. . . . @w1
Failure to boot console. @w2
Error 101 . @w1. @w1 Powersave mode active. @w2
. . . . @w1
Error 108 . @w1. @w1 Internal storage files damaged. @w2
. . . . @w1
Français:
. . . . @w1
Impossible de démarrer la console. @w2
Erreur 101 . @w1. @w1 Mode économie d'énergie activé. @w2
. . . . @w1
Erreur 108 . @w1. @w1 Fichiers de stockage interne endommagés. @w2
. . . . @w1

English:
Running system diagnostics. @w1. @w2 . @w2 . @w2 <color=#00ff11>completed</color>. @w2
The internal storage is still available and I found a few indices that date back nearly a year. 
I am not able to download their content as long as the console is in power save mode.
You <color=#ffffff>need to rebuild some devices</color> and add them to the station so we can power it up again.

Before we start working on the station, you should set up a camp: Collect some <color=#fbff00>fiber </color>and craft a <color=#fbff00>Survival Tent</color>.
Français:
Exécution des diagnostics système. @w1. @w2 . @w2 . @w2 <color=#00ff11>terminé</color>. @w2
Le stockage interne est toujours disponible et j'ai trouvé quelques indices qui remontent à près d'un an, mais je ne suis pas en mesure de télécharger leur contenu tant que la console est en mode économie d'énergie.
Vous devez <color=#ffffff>refabriquer certains éléments</color> et les ajouter à la station afin que nous puissions la remettre sous tension .

Mais avant tout, vous devez installer un camp : collectez de la <color=#fbff00>fibre </color> et fabriquez une <color=#fbff00>tente de survie</color>.

English:
You now have a basic constructor, which will allow you to craft all the devices necessary for rebuilding and powering the com station, as well as a basic weapon to defend yourself @w2 
For activating the station, you need to craft the following:@w1
- a <color=#ffffff>small generator</color> to power the station @w1
- a <color=#ffffff>fuel tank (t1)</color> to fuel the generator @w1
- a <color=#ffffff>core</color> to make everything work together. @p9These devices need more materials than we can probably find around here. We need to look further. @w1 

I have placed a <color=#fbff00>marker</color> on a <color=#fbff00>large wreckage</color> on your Radar and HUD. There we will find more materials!

Make sure to <color=#ffffff>harvest plants</color> and craft something to eat <color=#ffffff>while you are on your way</color> to the wreckage.
Français:
Grâce à votre constructeur portable, vous allez pouvoir fabriquer tous les appareils nécessaires à la reconstruction et à l'alimentation de la station de communication, ainsi qu'une arme de base pour vous défendre. @w2 
Pour activer la station, vous devez fabriquer ce qui suit :@w1
- un <color=#ffffff>petit générateur</color> pour alimenter la station @w1
- un <color=#ffffff>réservoir de carburant v1</color> pour alimenter le générateur @w1
 - un <color=#ffffff>noyau</color> indispensable à chaque structure. @p9Ces appareils ont besoin de plus de matériaux que nous ne pouvons probablement en trouver ici. Nous devons chercher plus loin. @w1 

J'ai placé un <color=#fbff00>marqueur</color> vers une <color=#fbff00>grosse épave</color> sur votre radar et votre HUD. Là, nous trouverons plus de matériaux !

Assurez-vous de <color=#ffffff>récolter des plantes</color> et de vous crafter quelque chose à manger, le temps d'atteindre l'épave.

English:
Powering console. @w1 
Loading operating system.  Please do not shut down while in progress.. @w1 . . . . . . @w1 
Session restored. @w1
Loading last message . @w1 . . . . . . @w1
Success. @w1 The message is fragmented. @w1 
Display content anyways?
Français:
Console d'alimentation. @w1 
Chargement du système d'exploitation. S'il vous plaît ne pas fermer pendant l'exécution.. @w1 . . . . . . @w1 
Session restaurée. @w1
Chargement du dernier message . @w1 . . . . . . @w1
Succès. @w1 Le message est fragmenté. @w1 
Afficher le contenu quand même ?

English: August, 2, 2473. @w1 UCH PID 19893-M @w1\nThe .. is lost. We .. survived and made contact with the Talon in the nearby village. @w1 The Zirax are on our heels. We  need to avoid running into their drones and .. until they lose interest. @w1 A temporary camp near .. I am afraid some of our .. vessels were shot down .. crashed .. not far away. We plan to .. If this plan fails, I advise every other survivor to go find one of the Talon villages. These guys helped us to survive, and might help you as well.@w1 - End of Message.
Français: 2 août 2473. @w1 UCH PID 19893-M @w1\nLe .. est perdu. Nous .. avons survécu et avons pris contact avec les Talon dans le village voisin. @w1 Les Zirax sont à nos trousses. Nous devons éviter leurs drones et .. jusqu'à ce qu'ils abandonnent. @w1 .. Un camp temporaire près de .. je crains que certains de nos .. navires n'aient été abattus .. écrasés .. pas très loin. Nous prévoyons de .. Si ce plan échoue, je conseille à tous les autres survivants d'aller trouver un des villages Talon. Ces gars-là nous ont aidés à survivre et pourraient vous aider aussi.@w1 - Fin du message.

English:
All the other logs are either destroyed or heavily fragmented. @w2

Commander .. there might be something wrong about this log. @w2
The timestamp of the message is of .. @w2 tomorrow @w1 .. and at the same time, the log file indicates that it was created one year ago! @w2
That does not add up at all.
Français:
Non il n'y a que ça. Tous les autres journaux sont soit détruits, soit fortement fragmentés. @w2

Commandant .. il y a quelque chose qui ne va pas avec ce journal. @w2
L'horodatage du message est de .. @w2 demain @w1 .. et en même temps, le fichier journal indique qu'il a été créé il y a un an! @w2

Ce n'est pas du tout cohérent.

English: The log was clearly made by someone from the UCH with the personal ID 19893-M. @w2\nI have validated the ID, but without access to the UCH fleet database, I cannot look up who is behind that ID. @w2\nHowever, I'm positive that a vessel from the Operation Phoenix fleet crashed here for some unknown reason. @p9 Those Zirax may have something to do with it. @w2 It could be due to a fight or could also be technical trouble. @w1 It might have happened in combat, as this would explain why neither the TITAN, nor anyone else of the fleet is here. @w2 They have probably moved on or escaped.
Français: Le journal est clairement établi par quelqu'un de l'UCH avec l'ID personnel 19893-M. @w2\nJ'ai validé l'ID, mais sans accès à la base de données de la flotte UCH, je ne peux pas savoir qui se cache derrière cet ID. @w2\nNéanmoins, nous pouvons être sûrs qu'un vaisseau de la flotte de l'Opération Phoenix s'est écrasé ici pour des raisons encore inconnues. @p9 Nous pouvons supposer que ces Zirax pourraient y être pour quelque chose. @w2 En fait, je ne peux certifier s'il s'agit d'un combat ou d'un problème technique,@w1 Mais cela aurait pu se produire au combat, ce qui expliquerait qu'il n'y ait personne d'autre ici. Ni le TITAN, ni personne d'autre de la flotte. @w2 Ils sont probablement partis ou se sont échappés.

English: Very strange, but could be explained in several ways. @w1\nA scientific reason why we did not arrive on the same day as the fleet: @w1 we were not fully enclosed by the TITAN's warp vortex @w1 and some gravitational instabilities have affected us similar to the time dilation effects near a black hole. @w2\nA simpler, more obvious reason: the timestamp and the log entries are damaged and faulty due to the damage to this station and the console,
Français: C'est en effet étrange, mais peut peut-être s'expliquer. @w1\nLa raison scientifique pour laquelle nous ne sommes pas arrivés le même jour que la flotte : @w1 nous n'étions pas complètement entrés dans le vortex espace-temps du TITAN @w1 et certaines instabilités gravitationnelles nous ont affectés de la même manière que les effets de dilatation du temps près d'un trou noir . @w2\nUne autre raison plus évidente pourrait être qu'en raison des dommages causés à cette station et à la console, l'horodatage et les entrées de journal sont simplement endommagés et défectueux.

English: We need to <color=#fbff00>find the Small Settlement</color> of the Talon. @w2 The message indicates those people might know more about what happened to the survivor that left this message here. @w2 I will set a <color=#fbff00>marker onto your hud</color>. @w2\n\nBefore we leave, I strongly suggest to unlock an <color=#ffffff>Assault Rifle</color> or the <color=#ffffff>Shotgun</color> from the Techtree (<color=#00ff11>F3</color>) and craft them in the Portable Constructor.
Français: De toute façon, nous devrons trouver plus d'informations. @w2 Il nous faut localiser cette <color=#fbff00>Petite colonie Talon</color>. @w2 Le message indique que ce peuple pourrait en savoir plus sur ce qui est arrivé au survivant qui a laissé ce message ici. @w2 Je place un <color=#fbff00>marqueur</color> sur votre hud. @w2\n\nAvant de partir, je vous conseille fortement de déverrouiller le <color=#ffffff>fusil d'assaut</color> ou le <color=#ffffff>fusil à pompe</color> de l'arbre technologique (<color=#00ff11> F3</color>) et de les fabriquer depuis le constructeur portable.
Ca me semble un bon plan!

English: That's great to hear! @w2 I would like to ask you for some help on a pretty @w2 .. unpleasant topic, we were not able to solve on our own: Our crop fields are repeatedly getting attacked by spider-like creatures. @w2\n\nThey pop into existence around the nearby <color=#ffffff>ancient tower</color>, attacking our workers. @w2 We would like to ask you to go there and investigate the reason for this to happen.
Français:
Vraiment? Ravi de l'entendre.. @w2
Nous souhaiterions faire appel à vos services concernant un @w2 .. sujet désagréable, que nous n'avons pas pu résoudre par nous-mêmes: Nos champs cultivés sont régulièrement attaqués par des araignées géantes. @w2 

Il y a cette <color=#ffffff>ancienne Tour</color> où elles apparaissent à proximité, comme par magie, attaquant nos ouvriers. Cette tour serait maudite, selon des rumeurs.. @p9Il y a même une expédition envoyée là-bas enquêter qui n'est jamais revenue .. @w2

Nous avons sollicité l'aide des peuplent Zirax et Polaris stationnés sur cette planète. @w2
Les Zirax ne nous ont pas écoutés et les Polaris craignent trop les Zirax pour osez nous aider. @w2 

Pourriez-vous aller enquêter sur place afin de découvrir la nature de ce phénomène ?

English: Can you tell me more about the attacks? (Additional Info)
Français: Pouvez-vous m'en dire plus sur ces Zirax et Polaris? (Info additionnelle)

English:
The ancients be praised! @w2 

You will find the <color=#ffffff>ancient tower</color> nearby this settlement.  

Please find out what has happened to our warriors. The inscription plates inside the tower may give a clue as to what is causing this threat. @p9 Before you go, please <color=#fbff00>head over to our trader</color>. @w2

Your people have left behind some equipment. @w2 
Make good use of it! @w2

May the voices of the past protect you, friend.
I will find out what is happening.
Français: Je vais tâcher de découvrir ce qui se passe..

English:
Hello, my friend! @w2

The chief told me to hand over some equipment they dropped in my junk box a few months ago.

A flamethrower and some ammo for it. @p9 This is nothing a real Talon warrior would ever use. @w2 But I am sure you can make good use of it, when eliminating the creatures coming from that monument tower. @w2 

This is an older model, so <color=#ffffff>do not aim too close</color> at the ground or at your feet to avoid harming yourself.@w2

May the voices of the past be with you.
Français:
Bonjour, mon ami! @w2

Notre chef m'a demandé de vous remettre le matériel que vos prédécesseurs ont laissé ici il y a quelques mois.

Un lance-flammes et ses recharges. @p9 Arme inutile pour un vrai guerrier Talon. @w2 Mais je suis sûr que vous pourrez en faire bon usage pour éliminer les créatures provenant de cette tour. @w2 

C'est un modèle plus ancien, donc <color=#ffffff>ne visez pas le sol trop près de vous</color> ou vous risquez de vous blesser.@w2

Puissent les voix du passé être avec vous.

English: What's this about other terrans? (Additional Info)
Français: Parlez-moi de ces autres Terrans ! (Info additionnelle)

English:
Hm.. strange you did not yet run into them while you survived on this planet for so long .. @w2 

@p9 Polaris Megacorp is running their business throughout the galaxy. @w2 

They are the biggest company in the exploration, mining and resources business. @w2

They have some relationship with the Zirax, but this is more a fragile state of at least not shooting at each other right away. @p9 The Polaris scientists are very interested in what happens here on this planet and in this system .. @w2 but as the Zirax activities on and around that planet have increased in the last months, we have rarely seen them. @w2

They are still running a quite impressive outpost, the '<color=#ffffff>Sanctuary</color>',  somewhere on this planet and delivering goods to our settlements .. @w2 secretly of course. @p9 The Zirax Empire, on the other hand, still runs a <color=#ffffff>full garrison</color> on this planet. @w2 

This whole system seems to be really important to them. @w2 Although not important enough they would really care for their troops well being. @w2 Seems to be more of an outpost you cannot decide to be sent to @w2 .. if you know what I mean. @p9 They are understaffed, underpaid, relying on extremely old equipment .. @w2 and occasionally come over to .. @w2 borrow some supplies.. @w2.

They are not friends with your people at all, and will shoot at them as soon as they see a terran in their scopes. @w2 

Be careful when you run into them. @p9 We are confident you will find answers against all these odds! @w2 
You have survived on this planet for so long. @w2 
You have the experience we need to solve this. @w2 

So, will you help us?
Français:
Polaris Megacorp dirige son entreprise dans toute la galaxie. @w2 

Ils représentent la plus grande entreprise du secteur de l'exploration, de l'exploitation minière et des ressources. @w2

Ils ont une relation particulière avec le Zirax, qui pourrait exploser à tout moment ! @p9 Les scientifiques de Polaris sont très intéressés par ce qui se passe ici sur cette planète et dans ce système .. @w2 mais au vu de l'augmentation des activités de Zirax sur la planète ces derniers mois, nous les avons rarement vus. @w2

Ils dirigent toujours un avant-poste assez impressionnant, le <color=#ffffff>Sanctuaire</color>, quelque part sur cette planète et livrent des marchandises à nos colonies .. @w2 secrètement bien sûr. @p9 L'empire Zirax, en revanche, dirige toujours une <color=#ffffff>Garnison</color> sur cette planète. @w2 

Ce système planétaire semble être vraiment important pour eux. @w2 Bien qu'il s'agisse d'une simple garnison, l'empire Zirax se soucierait vraiment du bien-être de ces troupes.. @w2 En fait, ça semble être bien plus qu'un avant-poste, que l'on peut simplement choisir comme affectation @w2 .. si vous voyez ce que je veux dire. @p9 Pourtant, ils manquent de personnel, sont sous-payés, dépendent d'un équipement extrèmement vieux .. @w2 et viennent occasionnellement pour .. @w2 nous emprunter des fournitures.. @w2.

Ils ne sont pas du tout amis avec votre peuple et tireront sur eux dès qu'ils auront un Terran dans leurs viseurs. @w2 

Soyez prudent si vous les rencontrez. @p9 Nous sommes convaincus que vous pouvez nous apporter des réponses ! @w2 
Vous avez survécu sur cette planète depuis si longtemps. @w2 
Vous avez l'expérience dont nous avons besoin pour résoudre ce problème. @w2 

Alors, voulez-vous nous aider ?

English: Sure. You help me, so I help you.
Français: Bien sur. Vous m'aidez, alors je vous aide.
Il y avait des plaques d'inscription dans la salle d'entrée

English:
Bi'phuan, friend!  @w2 I heard from the chief.. @w2 oh .. @w2 this injury looks serious! @w2 Let's not waste time! @w2

You need to craft <color=#fbff00>Antibiotic Pills</color> and apply them. @w2 Otherwise this dermal parasite will soon evolve into something worse!

Head over to the <color=#fbff00>trader.</color> He will give you 1x <color=#ffffff>Confetti Moss Scrapings</color> and 1x <color=#ffffff>Herbal Leaves</color>.

Bi'phuan, friend! @w2 

Please have this scrambler protocol installed to your suit com module. @w2 This way we and our allies can reach out to you more easily. @w2 

Check your PDA (<color=#00ff11>F1</color>) frequently for new communications and missions. @p9 The chief also wants me to hand you over something my father found a decade ago in a crashed ship. @w2 

It is an ancient warrior bow .. @w2 but it has been modified with some nice extras. @w2 I think you will like it when you run into a Zirax patrol anytime soon. @w2 

Have fun, friend and may the voices of the past guide you.
Français:
Bi'phuan, mon ami ! @w2 

Je vous transfère un protocole de brouillage dans le module de communication de votre combinaison. @w2 Grâce à lui, nous et nos alliés pourrons vous joindre plus facilement. @w2 

Consultez fréquemment votre PDA (<color=#00ff11>F1</color>) pour de nouvelles communications et missions. @p9 Le chef veut aussi que je vous remette quelque chose que mon père a trouvé il y a dix ans dans un vaisseau écrasé. @w2 

Il s'agit d'une arbalète de guerrier ancienne.... @w2 à laquelle j'ai apporté quelques améliorations du genre.. High-Tech . @w2 Je pense que vous apprécierez lorsque vous croiserez à l'avenir une patrouille Zirax. @w2 

Portez-vous bien mon ami, et que les voix du passé vous guident.
Merci à vous, j'apprécie le cadeau!

English:
Hello stranger! @w2

May the voices of the past lead you to wisdom. @w2

How may we help you?
Français:
Bonjour étranger! @w2

Que les voix du passé vous mènent à la sagesse. @w2

Comment pouvons-nous vous aider ?

English:
My sensors indicate there is a <color=#ffffff>mechanism</color> behind the wall nearby. @w2 
It seems to be linked to a device which ought to .. manage .. the stations functions. @w2<color=#fbff00></color>

Suggestion: @w2 Destroy the wall. @w2 It should be weak enough that pressing against it will crush it. @w2

Then <color=#ffffff>activate the mechanism.</color>
Français:
Mes capteurs indiquent qu'il y a un <color=#ffffff>mécanisme</color> derrière un des murs à proximité. @w2 
Il semble être relié à un appareil qui devrait ... gérer ... les fonctions du bâtiment. @w2<color=#fbff00>

Suggestion :</color>@w2 Détruire le mur.@w2 Apparemment sa structure doit être suffisamment faible pour céder sous votre poids. @w2

Ensuite, <color=#ffffff>activer le mécanisme.</color>

English:
Stranger, no time for long discussions! @w2 

The containment system is failing! @w2 

Tell my people! @w2 I am specialist Kar'han! @w2 Chief @w2 officer of ... @w2 the Talon-Zirax Assembly.....
Français:
Plus le temps de discuter, étranger ! @w2 

Le système de confinement est défaillant ! @w2 

Dis à mon peuple ! @w2 Je suis le spécialiste Kar'han ! @w2 Chef @w2 officier de ... @w2 l'Assemblée Talon-Zirax.....    @w2 FUIS !!

English:
No time for chatter! @w2 

I am feeling the Legacy already growing inside ... @w2

 ...@w2
Oh. @p9 I now remember. @w2 

My brain already seems to be getting dysfunctional. @w2 I am infected! @w2 

This is a cryo-containment facility... @w2 ... @p9 Listen, stranger, @w2 whoever you are, @w2 you need to get out of here now! @w2 

The Legacy has infested this place ... @w2 and me. @w2 
The Zirax will kill anyone who comes in contact with it. @w2 I wonder why this prison cell is even still here ... @w2 

I'm certain the self-destruct sequence is already activated.
Français:
Pas le temps de bavarder ! @w2 

Je sens que le LEGACY grandit... @w2 

 .. @p9 
Oh .. @w2 Je me souviens maintenant. @w2 

Mon cerveau commence déjà à me lâcher. @w2 Je suis infecté ! @w2 

On est ici dans une installation de cryo-contamination .. @w2 .. @p9 Ecoute étranger, @w2ou qui que tu sois .. @w2 tu dois quitter cet endroit ! @w2 

Le LEGACY a infesté ces lieux ... @w2 et moi par la même occasion. @w2 
Le Zirax tuera toute personne qui entrera en contact avec lui. @w2 Je me demande même pourquoi cette cellule est encore là ... @w2 

Je suis certain que la séquence d'autodestruction est déjà activée.

English:
Then ... @w2 What are you waiting for! @w2 We don't have a lot of time left! @w2 

The Legacy is seizing this world. @w2 The Infinite Life Program has failed. @w2 
The Zirax scum have nothing better to do than arrest all the science officers! @w2 

Quick - we need to get out of here!
Français:
Alors ... @w2 Qu'est-ce que tu attends ? @w2 Il ne nous reste plus beaucoup de temps ! @w2 

Le LEGACY s'empare de ce monde. @w2 Le Programme «Vie Infinie» a échoué. @w2 
Cette racaille de Zirax n'a rien de mieux à faire que d'arrêter tous les officiers scientifiques ! @w2 

Vite, nous devons sortir d'ici !

English:
Bi'phuah! @w2 Who are you? @w2 Some new Zirax scum? @w2

This isn't some high-value-target prison with some comfort to ex... @w2

Oh ... @w1 You don't look like a Zirax!
Français:
Bi'phuah ! @w2 Qui es-tu ? @w2 Encore une ordure de Zirax ? @w2

Tu viens voir si je manque de rien, si j'ai tout le confort qu'il... @w2

Mais ... @w1Tu ne ressembles pas à un Zirax !

English:
The Goddess be praised! @w2 

You are alive! @w2 

Were you able to find a trace of the expedition?
Français:
La Déesse soit louée ! @w2 

Vous êtes vivant ! @w2 

Avez-vous pu trouver une trace de l'expédition ?

English:
Oh, that's not good. @w2 

This is actually worse than we expected. @w2

But thanks to you, we at least have a definitive answer about what happened .. @w2 do we?
Français:
Oh, ce n'est pas bon. @w2 

C'est en fait pire que ce à quoi nous nous attendions. @w2 

Mais grâce à vous, nous avons au moins une réponse définitive sur ce qui s'est passé...

English: Interesting .. they say: @w2\n\nThe Legacy once ruled all the worlds of this galaxy. @w5 Worlds fell apart and into silence, but the honorable Zirax, with the Infinite Life Program, were able to end the threat once and for all, and it might never return. @w5 Praise the High Command!
Français: Oui, nous les avons vues aussi, et traduites partiellement.. @w2Voici ce qu'elles mentionnent : @w2\n\nLe LEGACY régnait autrefois sur tous les mondes de cette galaxie, @w5 précipitant l'effondrement de ces derniers et les plongeant dans le silence. Mais les honorables Zirax, grâce au programme «Vie Infinie», ont pu définitivement mettre fin à la menace, empêchant son retour à jamais. @w5 Louez le Haut Commandement!

English:
The name Kar'han is still well known in the tales of our tribe. @w2 

He is known as The First Warrior, fighting the oppression of the Zirax. @w2 

But these ... tales ... are hundreds of years old. I doubt they are entirely true.  @p9 Excuse me, friend. @w2 These are disturbing revelations. @w2 

A long-forgotten menace might just raised its dreadful head again and seems to be already here and infecting our people. @w2 This is ... @w2 

I'll have to speak to the Elders' Council. @p9 In the meantime, please speak to our <color=#fbff00>Blacksmith</color>. @w2 He might be able to help you with your equipment.  @w2 

May the voices of the past protect you, friend.
Français:
Le nom de Kar'han est encore bien connu dans les contes de notre tribu. @w2 

Il est connu comme le Premier Guerrier, combattant l'oppression des Zirax. @w2 

Mais ces ... contes ... ont des centaines d'années. Je doute qu'ils soient entièrement vrais. @p9 Excusez-moi, mon ami. @w2 Ce sont des révélations troublantes. @w2 

Une menace depuis longtemps oubliée vient peut-être de ressurgir et semble être déjà de retour et infecter notre peuple. @w2 C'est ... @w2 

Je vais devoir en parler au Conseil des Anciens. @p9 En attendant, allez voir notre <color=#fbff00>Forgeron</color>. @w2 Il pourra peut-être vous aider avec votre équipement. @w2 

Que les voix du passé te protègent, mon ami.

English:
Your people came here about a year ago. @w2 

They seem to have fought with the Zirax patrols in orbit and some of their vessels crashed on this planet. @w2

We helped them survive until they were able to escape. @p9 So, please pardon our curiosity @w2 ... @w2 but what are YOU still doing here? @w2
 
How did you manage to escape the Zirax patrols for so long?
Français:
Votre peuple est venu ici il y a environ un an. @w2 

Ils ont conbattu les patrouilles Zirax situées en orbite et certains de leurs vaisseaux se sont écrasés sur cette planète. @w2

Nous les avons aidés à survivre jusqu'à ce qu'ils puissent repartir. @p9 Alors, pardonnez notre curiosité @w2 ... @w2 mais que faites-vous encore ici? @w2 

Comment avez-vous réussi à échapper aux patrouilles Zirax pendant si longtemps?

English:
First, we would like to send you on a simple mission: @w2 Go to the <color=#ffffff>Asteroid Field</color> at the edge of the Ellyon system. @w2 There you will find a <color=#ffffff>Polaris Mining Facility</color>. @w2 Approach it and wait for further orders. @w2

Your suit AI has just been sent the mission package. @w2 
It will be decrypted step by step and reveal all necessary info when you arrive there.

You seem to be surprised to speak to a hovering smiley face in front of a terminal? @w2

I am afraid we need to have some ... @w2 security measures in place. @w2 

That's why I'm speaking to you via this remote access terminal.

... @w2 I currently can't relay any of that information, I am afraid. @w2 ... @w2But let's get started. @w2 \n\nThe Zirax Scum are always on our heels and the AI protecting our little meeting is already detecting some cyber-espionage patterns trying to break in on our conversation.

First and foremost, I am .. @w2 your contact person, Sectioner32. @w2 

On behalf of GLaD, the <color=#ffffff>G</color>alactic <color=#ffffff>L</color>iberation <color=#ffffff>a</color>nd <color=#ffffff>D</color>efense organization, I would like to thank you for answering our call. @w2

You won't regret it. @w2 And it will make the galaxy a better place!

Ah, good. @w2 Well .. @w2

But .. @w2 hm .. you must have been already underway, right?

Of course ... @w2 Ah ... @w2 Sorry ... @w2

First let me note, the mining operations on the <color=#ffffff>PLANET</color> have gone very well. @w6 I often feel like a <color=#ffffff>REMNANT </color>@w2 when I look at all those great people working on this project. @w7 You would be surprised, we often do not need to descend into the dark <color=#ffffff>MINE </color>@w2 to find interesting opportunities. @p9 If you ask me, each house needs some <color=#ffffff>GUIDANCE</color>, @w2 even if you need to handle it on a staff or on a <color=#ffffff>STICK</color>, @w2 before venturing to places where <color=#ffffff>ANCIENT HISTORY</color> is still breathing.

Commander, @w2 our new Talon friends have just sent us the position of a large crashed vessel. @w2\n\nThey suspect it is one of ours, as some of the survivors came from its direction, they say. @p9 There is one caveat, though. @w2 We need to take into account what the Talon Chief said.@w2 The survivors came to this settlement a planetary rotation ago. @w2 This might indicate that the console we found that message was not broken .. @w2 but we have lost one year while being dragged to Andromeda ...
Français: Commandant, @w2 nos nouveaux amis Talon viennent de nous envoyer la position d'un gros vaisseau écrasé. @w2\n\nIls pensent que c'est l'un des nôtres, car certains des survivants venaient de sa direction, disent-ils. @p9 Mais d'après les propos du chef Talon, @w2 Les survivants sont arrivés dans cette colonie il y a une une année planétaire. @w2 Cela pourrait indiquer que la console que nous avons trouvée n'était pas cassée+ .... @w2 mais que nous avons perdu un an en étant entraînés vers Andromède ...

English: Let's go there and find out.
The ancient be praised! @w2 You are coming to rescue me from this Zirax scum @w2 .. I hope?
You may leave your cage now. Good luck!

Interesting story! @w2 I was sent to this planet to investigate the recent activities of the gravitational anomaly that seems to spit out ships and crews into this system from time to time. @w2 Risky mission, due to the Zirax presence.. @w2 but as the last reported event was exactly one year ago, I was sent to see what is going on again. @w2 I only made the mistake to set up my camp right here for investigating the resonance waves in materials that went through that anomaly already once and... @w2 I digress...
What do you know about the incident a year ago?

Not much, I am afraid. @w2 We got a report of a gravitational anomaly in this sector. @w2 The Zirax Empire was amassing ships at its exit. @w2 I think they were not as surprised as we were. @w2 Some of the ships of the incoming fleet managed to escape. @w2 Some were destroyed and some crashed on the planets of this system. @w2 Like the one nearby. @w2 The survivors managed to escape the Zirax, thanks to the help of the Talon and my people. @w2 They mentioned something about an expedition fleet .. @w2 Operation Phoenix. I think.
Do you know where the survivors went?

Yes and no. @w2 After our rescue teams managed to bring them past the Zirax lines and off that planet, they were picked up by one of their vessels. @w2 I am afraid I have no info where they went. @w2 BUT when you want to find them, I suggest you find agent Kezzel. @w2 He will probably be around in the Sanctuary as he is my contact for this mission.

I am pretty sure the Zirax will send reinforcements soon. @w2 And as they know my face and, @w2 as you might have guessed, @w2 I do not have any combat experience .. @w2 I will be arrested in no time. @w2 May I ask you then to bring this encrypted data chip to agent Kezzel? @w2 It holds a <color=#ffffff>Space Anomalies Report</color> with info about the anomaly and how it affects certain materials. @w2 They are extremely valuable.
Sure. I need to go there anyways. (Skip)

Thanks a lot, my friend! @w2 You can find <color=#ffffff>Kezzel </color>in the <color=#ffffff>Sanctuary</color>! @w2 Just give him the <color=#ffffff>Space Anomalies Report . </color>\n\n@w2 Tell him Dr. Mandor sent you and he might help you in return of a little favor.

Feel free to take my <color=#ffffff>Hover Vessel</color> I parked nearby. @w2 The troopers have removed some devices .. @w2 to sell them .. @w2 but they are still over there in the containers. @w2 Simply put them back and you are good to go.\n\n@w2 Wish you all the best!

..has hit us hard. @w2 Kind of a large projectile or a very advanced rocket. @w2 We got separated from the main fleet. @w2 These guys have cut us off from the rest and are trying to bring us down. @w2 They will be successful. @w2 The captain has sent the emergency rescue signal. @w2 We are making an emergency landing. @w2 All engines are off. @w2 I am off to the rescue pod. @w2\n\nNicole Palant, Chief Engineer 1st class, UCH Heidelberg

Captain Brenner and most of the flight team were killed just seconds ago. @w2 A projectile hit the bow amidships. @w2 I was incredibly lucky. @w2 My absolutely justified criticisms, made after we ran into this mess, @w2 caused the lieutenant to send me to check the lifeboats - @w2 seconds before the bridge was hit. @w2 Karma ? So what do we do next?

Pick up the Hover Vessel nearby and find the <color=#fbff00>Sanctuary</color>. @w2 Speak to agent <color=#fbff00>Kezzel</color>. @w2 \n\nIn case our new friend Dr. Mandor can be trusted, he might be willing to help someone from the 'terran expedition forces' @w2 .. in return for a favor .. @w2 possibly.

Speaking to the commander of the station.

So.. the Doctor has sent you. @w2 Wonderful! @w2
Then I'll better contact the committee and announce your arrival with trumpets and fanfares...! @w2
.. @w2 
Do I look like an idiot? @w2 Get out of my sight or I'll.. @w2 .. @w2 ..@w2 oh.. I am getting a call. @w2 Who will that be? @w2 Possibly someone with nice advice to throw you out of the station or arrest you right away?

Hmpf. @w2 Seems like you said the truth. @w2  My pardon. @w2 Things are becoming a bit .. @w2 rough .. the last days and there are too few of us to protect the Sanctuary. @w2 Anyways.. @w2

You see that <color=#ffffff>elevator</color> behind me? @w2 
Go up one level. @w2 Then to the right. @w2 
Hurry up. @w2 Carver is waiting for you.

Hello Sir! @w2

He wanted me to fetch some of his equipment.

Oh no, not that again. @w2 Gosh. @w2 I am not his personal secretary he can send his minions to .. @w2 I am the commander of this fricking station surrounded by .. @w2 Ah, forget about it. @w2 ... @w2

Please go back to the elevator and one level up. @w2
Find his assistant <color=#fbff00>Kezzel </color>up there .. somewhere. @w2 He manages the equipment of the Doctor. @w2

Doctor Mandor has sent you over, to bring me some precious presents, so valuable that he gave them to a .. @w2 stranger? @w2

What you are carrying around might be a key element to understand what is going on  here and...

Hm.. these are encrypted. @w2 Will take a while. @w2 Security measures, you know. @w2 Our .. Zirax friends might not even have understood whom they had in their filthy hands... @w2\n\nSomething else?

Hm.. he promised that? Really?  @w2 
Savior or not. @w2 I think that's a bit too much to ask for classified information in our .. @w2 juvenile acquaintance, don't you think? @w2

Beyond that, it is not on me to give you that info, @w2 but maybe you can try to convince me that I can trust you and I will see what I can do. @w2 How does this sound?

Very nice. @w2 Listen: @w3 I was in contact with a Talon named Kaydan. Not here. On a remote planet ..  @w2 which was used by your people as well as far as I know. @w2 We are both searching for some Technical Artifacts that are hidden in old burial chambers. @w2 He found some on that planet already. @w2 And here comes the problem: I am saying 'was used' because the Zirax have attacked that site and I am not sure if Kaydan and the others made it out there alive. @p9 For now those artifacts he found are out of reach .. @w2 and I am afraid we cannot wait until we are possibly able to meet again. @w2 Things are heating up and time is running fast. @p9 Luckily there is a burial chamber on this planet nearby the Sanctuary. @w2 It is similar to the one on the training planet. @w2 Of course we cannot simply go there. @w2 This would for sure arouse the Zirax troops. @w2 They are already looking at our activities with some suspicion.
So you are sending me in, correct?
Hey my friend! @w2 \n\nSo you managed to find something?

Hm.. @w2 Seems like someone else was after these artifacts as well. @w2 But why did they leave them behind? @w2\n\nDoes not make sense for me. @w2 Did you find any human remains? @w2 Anything left behind?
Oh..! Wait. @w2 \n\nThat ring you found is not only a ring .. @w2 when I am not mistaken it belongs to a member of the Abyssal family...

Yes. @w2 Interesting, isn't it? @w2 What were they doing here? As you know, the Abyssal are an influential house of the Zirax Empire. @w2 The current Empress of the Empire is one of theirs. @w2 They are usually not seen so far away from the Zirax homeworlds. @w2 Maybe someone stole that ring .. and lost it again down in the tomb.. @w2 Hm.. maybe.. @w2 Not sure what the Xenu, Ghyst, Rados, Serdu and Epsilon are currently up to. @w2 You leave their territory for a minute and next time you knock on their door, someone else is in charge. @w2 Last time I talked to my contacts, there seemed to be something going on behind the curtain.. @w2 Something big.

Not sure if I should share that .. @w2 but you have proven twice that you can be trusted .. @w2 at least a bit. @w2\n\nSo .. @w2 I heard some rumors that.. hm.. lets say: @w2 things are getting more complicated for the Empress. @w2 Rumors about a riot, a revolt behind the scenes and more serious things threatening the Empire. @w2 And given there were Abyssal or maybe someone unknown but possibly related to the Zirax in that tomb searching for the artifacts, this menace does not seem to be the Kriel that have started to challenge the Zirax...

Hm.. @w2 you already heard about that particular rumor, as it seems. @w2 I hope this stays a rumor, otherwise we would be in real big trouble, in case those Talon elders are right and their frightening bed time stories become true.. @w2\n\nActually @w2 .. I do not know what's going on. @w2 But I will report that to my contact person that an insignia of the House of Abyssal was found in this system.
What about the survivors of Operation Phoenix?

Go<color=#fbff00> visit the orbital trading station</color> when you are done with whatever job brought you to this planet. @w2 Get yourself a <color=#ffffff>Root Beer</color>, sit down at the <color=#ffffff>Sky Guys bar</color> and enjoy the view. @w2

I'll report to my organization and see what I can do for you. @w2 You have already convinced me and I will now try to convince my supervisors to help you. @w2 Won't take long, I hope. 

@p9 Before you leave.. @w2 because you helped me and rescued doctor Mandor, I will<color=#fbff00> gift you one of our base teleporters</color>. @w2

Place it onto your own base, but make sure you have enough generators to run it, so they do not explode. @w2 It will link itself to the Sanctuary and you can come here without having to walk or drive. @p9 Ah.. before I forget .. @w2 not sure if it might be of any help, but I have located a shot down Small Vessel of the Operation Phoenix fleet just nearby the Zirax Garrison on this planet: @w2 You can <color=#fbff00>use the secret teleporter</color> behind these crates. It will bring you to a hidden observation site. From there you should be able to find the small vessel with a detector. @w2 Prepare for Zirax patrols.  @w2 Good luck!

Hello my friend! @w2 Where are you speaking from? @w2 Seems to be a party going on and I am not invited? @w2 <laughs>  @w2\n\nEnjoy, but don't rest too long. @w2 I have word from my organisation. @w2 Due to your excellent performance in this mission,  helping TOP to regain that beer recipe, they have chosen to give you more info on the matter of Operation Phoenix.

Ha. With a FIRE stick (% success chance / % losing stick on success / % losing stick on failure) Failed hacking attempts but also too many approaches on report exports will lead to the console getting LOCKED. You need to have clearance keys or FIRE sticks in your inventory for the access/hacking option being shown! @p9 @d0 FIRE STICKS ( 'Forced Information Release Executable' remote hacking device) of different quality (green, blue, red) can be bought in various places. The red grades will not be available in locations with a lot of military troops or security. @w2 Search for black markets or pirate nests. @w2 Note: Even when successfully hacking a device, each type of FIRE stick has an individual chance of being destroyed in the process. The chance to destroy the stick is doubled for failed hacking attempts. @p9 @d0 CLEARANCE KEYS Consoles that got locked can ONLY be accessed and unlocked with the appropriate clearance key! You can also use clearance keys for exporting reports. But these keys will ALWAYS be consumed in the process. Clearance keys are not traded officially. You might find agents or persons that want to offer you those keys for helping or for going on a mission for them.

These creatures are threatening our settlements, frightening our women and children. @p9 We are of course able to fend off these creatures each time they show up. @w2

But it won't end! @w2

If anything, the frequency of their appearance has gradually increased in the last weeks. @p9 A few days ago, we sent a group of warriors to find out about the reason for this to happen. @w2

But they never returned. @w2

So did the group of men that was sent to help them. @p9 What we know so far: @w2 All seems to have started some months ago. @w2

That century old <color=#ffffff>ancient tower</color> nearby this settlement suddenly came to .. @w2 unholy life. @p9Inside the tower, there are several plates with inscriptions.@w2

We were not able to understand them completely, but the elders say they are talking about a war. @w2

Long ago and forgotten as it seems. @p9 We only have some child-frightening stories about a threat that is sleeping in the ground. @w2

But looking at what is happening around us right now, what is threatening our people and the wasted, irradiated areas of death that suddenly grew into this land.. @w2

The Elders' Council is highly concerned!   Each day this riddle is not solved, might turn the tides against us. @p9 The Zirax Empire garrison commander on this planet did not listen to us. @w2

They do not even recognize this strange kind of .. @w2 unholy terraforming as a threat. @p9 And the Polaris scientists do not dare to officially show up here anymore. @w2
Polaris officials haven't been seen outside their stations a lot anymore, since the Zirax soldiers started to kidnap them to extort the company for ransom.
Sounds serious. Let's not waste time. (Skip)

Thanks. I'll bring the reports and try to find him.

So you did some investigations already? (Skip)

<color=#fbff00>Search and rescue</color>: Head over to the station, find Yarod and escape. @w2\n\nNote: @w2: the station might officially be labeled 'under a civil management', but <color=#ffffff>expect anyone with a weapon trying to kill you</color> as we do not know if this mission might already be compromised.. @w2 ..but try not create too much havoc please.
Probably not an easy goal to achieve... (Skip)
..but first you want me to do something for you, correct? (Skip)
So .. we only need to find an archive with more info? (Skip)
Please download all info to my device. (Skip)
The prisoners are now my top priority. (Skip)
Save the files please. What are our next steps? (Skip)
..but before answering my questions you want me to do something? (Skip)

Correct. 

That's the plan: head over to that <color=#fbff00>Burial Chamber</color> and search for the <color=#fbff00>Technical Artifact</color>. Watch out for everything else that might be interesting and bring it over here.

Then we can talk again.
What can I do for you? (Skip)

Nothing too serious. 

To get the gratification for taking part in the evaluation program, we would like to ask you to fly to our new low-gravity <color=#fbff00>distillery</color>, which is located in this planet's orbit. There, <color=#fbff00>speak to our brewmaster</color>.

Simple as that.
Report has been exported: Space Weather
Report has been exported: Space Anomaly
Report has been exported: Weapon Signatures
Report has been exported: Warp Signatures
Report has been exported: Navigation Data
Report has been exported: Exploration Raw Data
Report has been exported: Planetary Resource Data
Report has been exported: Atmospheric Data
Report has been exported: Geological Data
Report has been exported: Astronomical Data
Report has been exported: Science Raw Data
Report has been exported: Biological Data
Report has been exported: Material Data
Report has been exported: Archeological Data
Report has been exported: Anomalous Data
Reset Local <color=#ffffff>Report download</color> count <color=#ff0000>(unlocks ALL report console in POI)</color>
I cannot yet determine the cause beyond a doubt, Commander.
I thought you had just asked me to determine what is causing the unusual radio interference we have been experiencing since entering solar orbit!
Sorry. I was just thinking about the first Christmas party in the UCH fleet.

You mean the party where you accidentally threw Vice Admiral Perez into the pool @w2 after showing off your dancing skills @w2  and where Alex Lamarr knocked you out for trying to scare her .. @w2 in a 'funny' way ? @w2  Or where you ... @w2 

Please wait. @w3 The analysis is complete. @w2 

But we're welcome to reminisce some more.

The affected frequency band oscillates in a certain rhythm. @w2  This seems to emanate from the surface of the sun. @w2 \n\nThat oscillations of a star make noise is well known, @w2 but usually the oscillations do not produce repetitive, precisely modulated oscillations in the form of a hexadecimal code: @w2  <color=#ffffff>4a 69 6e 67 6c 65 20 42 65 6c 6c 73</color>
A very big coincidence? The infinite universe and all that?

Possible. @w2  However, it becomes unlikely if more than one star would send exactly the same 'message'. @w2 And that is exactly the case here: <color=#ffffff>there is another one!</color> @w2 That other star is in resonance with the one we are in orbit of right now. We should investigate the matter. @w2\n\nOpen the Galaxy Map (<color=#00ff11>M</color>) and use the <color=#00ff11>'System Search</color>' button. Enter '<color=#ffffff>ContAr1a95</color>' in the TYPE field to find the solar system.
Sure. We don't have anything else to do right now.
Good afternoon and happy holidays! \n\nPlease enter the current star frequency password.
Wrong password.\n\nHappy holidays and visit us soon again!
Input error. Please enter the password in letters.\n\nHappy holidays and visit us soon again!

< Universal translator: information cannot be processed. Search context word pattern. @w3 Replace unknown term with: @w3 Christmas > @w3\n\nGood afternoon, visitor. My name is ELV-54-NTA. @w2 Welcome to one of many Event Logistic Ventures facilities! We bring the holidays under your Christmas tree! @w2 A message has been left for you.
Christmas. ELV. Interesting. Please play message!

Dear {PlayerName} a rather terrible mishap has happened to us. @w2 

I am sending this at an unguarded moment. @w2 A Brotherhood ship has raided the station as we were loading the sled. They have taken my wife and me to a place that could not be more un-Christmas-like. @w2 

We hope to be rescued! -S
Yes, visitor. The message was explicitly addressed to you. @w2\n\nObviously you've been very good this past year!
I was...? Is this some kind of weird joke?

No, visitor. @w2 The message was sent <color=#ffffff>from the moon of the gas giant in this system</color>. So they can't have gone far yet! @w2
Quick - use the <color=#ffffff>weapons in the red containers</color>. Use our delivery spaceship outside the door to get to the moon undetected! @w2

Please help us and save Christmas!
Well who could refuse to help the elves.

Good afternoon, visitor. My name is ELV-54-NTA. @w2

This station is not manned at the moment. 
Please come back later.
Hello stranger, how can I be of service?
One question: how do you get to this exclusive sales location? (Story)

Well... that's a good question. @w2 It is a little strange. @w2 I was actually about to close my shop at Kennex Station for the station rest period before Christmas. Then I got dizzy for a second and suddenly here I was. @w2 But why bother. @w2  As they say in the Guild: one chance. A deal. Isn't it?

Honestly ... no idea what happened. @w2 I've been wondering all day why there's not the usual clientele here. @w2 I mean this still looks like the village I started in a week ago, but something's different since today? Like it's not Christmas, but something invisible and threatening is coming our way.

When I find THESE mischief-makers! @w2 Christmas party. Pah! @w2 They obviously drugged me and then dumped me here in this strange mix of Farr place of worship and Talon village. @w2 You can't sell stuff to the villagers and the brothers will take your mind without buying anything. @w3 I'll show the rascals from the trade academy what I think of such jokes. That's four weeks' punishment in the waste warehouse. @w2 At least!
Yes, yes. Punishment is a must.

I honestly think it's providence! @w2 Farr has always guided me safely so far and keeps his hand over my profits. You should definitely visit the great library and monuments on our homeworld for Christmas. It's quite an experience! @w2 Shall I tell you more about Farr?
Oh. Hello stranger. @w2\n\nIt may sound strange to you, but it would be better if you leave this place before you too are trapped here.

This settlement of ours was mysteriously abducted in its entirety to this place. @w2

There was suddenly an all-encompassing darkness - and we were here. 
@p9I don't know how they did it, but shortly afterwards people from all over the galaxy appeared within minutes ... even some Zirax. @w2 All telling the same story. See that big building up ahead. @w2

We're sure those galactic sectarians had something to do with the whole thing.
The who? What makes you think that?

The building is a part or fragment of a temple of the Brotherhood of Farr. @w2 Underneath is a huge cavity filled with every abomination you can imagine. @w2

Our village was somehow ... fused with this facility. @p9 Shortly after we regained our senses, a group of hooded men were seen by the guards bringing down cages of prisoners. @w2

We tried to free them but failed miserably. We sealed the hole to keep the creatures locked up underneath.
I have to go down there - unfortunately

You'd better think twice and get out of there. Death lurks here. Or worse. @w2\n\nBut if you're really sure, <color=#fbff00>give this present to our shaman</color> over at the <color=#fbff00>temple ruins</color>. He will open the tomb for you. @w2 Look around the village and take what you can use - and free us too, while you're at it. Good luck.
Nothing less do I intend! Thank you!

Hello stranger! @w2 This is not a good time to visit our settlement right now. If you wish, come back later. If you hurry up and get off this moon - @w2 in the mean fly before it's too late ... @w2 I mean before it's dark and too late at night, I'm sure you can find other places of interest on this system's planet. @w2 Wouldn't that be great?

Oh...so you really want to take a chance. @w2 Although you must realise what could possibly be waiting for you down there? Very well, stranger.  @w2

The elders be with you. @w2

I'll open the door for you.

You shouldn't have to worry about that. @w2 If you're really interested,<color=#fbff00> talk to our chief</color> on the other side of the village. @w2 \n\nBut I really recommend you leave this moon behind as soon as possible - so you don't miss out on the great sights in this system or anywhere else!
That sounds like a good idea!
Finally! I wasn't expecting any more help. @w2\n\nThe villagers tried everything, but the cowl-bearers only dragged us deeper into this cave.

A ship raided our orbital station just as the transporter was being reloaded for Christmas deliveries. @w2 Suddenly everyone had a murderous pressure in their heads. @w2 I passed out and woke up here again. @p9There were five of us in the station. 

There are <color=#ffffff>more cages down there</color> with my colleagues and they're holding our two foremen by that skeleton at the bottom of the cave! @w2

Please find them and save them!
That's exactly what I intend to do
Something is lurking here. I can feel it.
That voice ... I can hear it
The lower being shows no signs of successful transformation.

Oh... this is interesting you can hear me, lower being. @w2 Most interesting. I guess the other lower beings were right after all, bringing you here would help my cause. @w2 

Their elevation was obligatory, but well deserved. @w2

But know this is not the last time we will meet
So this all has been a trap? IDA? (SKIP)
IDA, did you just record that? (Additional Info)
Commander, I assume you are speaking to an entity whose information medium I do not follow. @w2\n\nHowever, the moment you ended, the hexadecimal signal disappeared.
Something about an unsuccessful transformation and other lower beings?

According to the data, it could be that the whisperer is identical to a spirit being called the LEGACY or one of its local presences. @w2\n\nOn that premise, and that the entity has captured and transformed personnel from the UCH Operation Phoenix fleet, I could offer an explanation.

It is speculative, but through your successes against the entity and its creatures, it may have had the idea of setting a trap for you to check why you could not be infected by the so-called 'Legacy Particle'. @w2 

This question arises, after all we have learned so far and due to the fact how often you should have been exposed to the particle. @p9The bait was then probably laid with the help of the idea of Christmas. @w2 Apparently, the entity took the meaning of this holiday from the minds of possibly converted UCH members and found it suitable to lure you in. @w2 Fittingly, the cargo station in orbit seems to belong to a company that organises shipments for a local holiday. @w2 

A holiday that apparently closely resembles the earthly Christmas, which is why the universal translator had also referenced that word.
But that would be an enormous amount of work for a ... lower being?

The action was apparently neatly planned so that you would avoid suspicion in advance once the idea of 'Christmas' was successfully planted in your mind. @w2 

We still don't know enough about the motivations of the entity called 'The LEGACY', but apparently you have aroused its very special interest. @p9So at least it remains a possible explanation. @w2 The so-called 'Brothers' or <color=#ffffff>Brotherhood of Farr</color> seem to have had a hand in this as well. @w2 

Apparently, the entity could not take final action here itself. @w2 We should perhaps pay a visit to this brotherhood soon and find out what they have to do with the Legacy.
Yeah, there's a word or two to be said about that.
Commander! @w2 The 'foreman' of the rescued wants to speak to you
Please put him on the screen

Hello {PlayerName}! @w2 I don't even know how to thank you! @w2  We were already done with life. @w2 

I don't know why the brothers ambushed us and brought us here. They have never been seen so far outside their territory and, as far as I know, have never attacked or even abducted people. @p9 It's like a miracle that you found us and saved us. @w2 

On behalf of 54-NTA, the whole staff, my wife and myself - you saved Christmas. @w2 

Not just for us, but for half the galaxy. @w2 If you ever need any help, let us know.

It's the least I can do. I am true to my word, as S'An Thaclaus is my name. @w2 As a token of this, I give you one of my precious medals, which I receive every year from the colonists of this galaxy for my services. @w2\n\nI also send you directly some of our popular Christmas gifts. @w2 Please distribute them to your loved ones as soon as you are back with them. @w2 I wish you all the best and a Merry Christmas!

Signal received. @w2 Frequency isolated and analysed. @w2

It's the same hexadecimal code: <color=#ffffff>4a 69 6e 67 6c 65 20 42 65 6c 6c 73 </color>@w2

Analysis of the frequency pattern suggests that the stars are .. @w2 singing!
Singing stars ... what are they singing?
Not enough information. @w2\n\nBut there is a third element that resonates with the singing stars in <color=#ffffff>orbit of the planet in this system</color>.
Now we'll see what's special about this one...
Hm... OK. Where is the position signal coming from?
The signal is coming from a small settlement.  \n\nI've <color=#fbff00>marked the position</color> for you.

<color=#00ffff>Salvage</color> @w1

Use this mode for recovering usable materials from wrecks. With the Survival Tool you cannot regain the full amount of materials or components, but only a fraction. 

If a <color=#ff0000>red box</color> lights up on the lower right, you will not get back any materials.

<color=#00ffff>Resource </color>@w1

Use this mode for harvesting fiber from plants, wood logs from trees, extracting ore from the rocks lying around or drilling down to underground deposits. 

Note: make use of your personal drone (<color=#00ff11>F5</color>) for mining underground deposits to avoid getting trapped in a deep mining hole.

Oh what a lovely gift. @w1

I want to give you something in return too!  @w1

Here you go! Merry Christmas!
Merry christmas to you as well!
Thank you for your assistance. I'll contact my people and they will come pick me up soon.
Français: Merci pour votre aide. Je vais contacter mes proches et ils viendront me chercher bientôt.

English: Please you have to help me! I'm a very wealthy member of the Traders Guild and these filthy pirates abducted me and held me prisoner!
Français: S'il vous plaît, vous devez m'aider ! Je suis un membre très riche de la guilde des commerçants et ces sales pirates m'ont enlevé et retenu prisonnier !

English: You are safe now. <color=#ff0000>(-2000 Pirates reputation)</color>
Français: Vous êtes en sécurité maintenant. <color=#ff0000>(-2000 de réputation avec les Pirates)</color>

English: The prisoner hands you a data pad with a message addressed to you by name.
Français: Le prisonnier vous tend un bloc de données avec un message qui vous est adressé par votre nom.

English: Oh thank you, thank you so much! I will contact my people and they will send a ship for me. I will transfer some credits from my bank account to yours.
Français: Oh merci, merci beaucoup ! Je vais contacter mon peuple et ils enverront un navire pour moi. Je vais transférer quelques crédits de mon compte bancaire au vôtre.

English: I'm glad to be of service.
The Raven sings on the midnight sun.
Français: Le corbeau chante sur le soleil de minuit.

English: The Raven's shadow rises in the twilight.
Français: L'ombre du corbeau se lève dans le crépuscule.

English: I have a package for you.
My time is very valuable. What do you want?
Français: Mon temps est très précieux. Que voulez-vous ?

English: The crow caws at the nest.
The sun shines during the day.
Français: Le soleil brille durant la journée.

English: I think I'll leave you here.
Français: Je pense que je vais vous laisser ici.

English: I think somebody is trying to kill me!
Français: Je pense que quelqu'un essaie de me tuer !
Détendez-vous. Vous êtes en sécurité ici.

English: Actually, now that you mention it...
Français: En fait, maintenant que vous le dites...

English: @d0<size=125%>Progenitor Data Decrypted: <color=#00ffff>{Eden_UCHResearch}</color> Terabytes.</size>\n\nResearch Computer stands ready.
Français: @d0<size=125%>Données des progéniteurs décryptées: <color=#00ffff>{Eden_UCHResearch}</color> Terabytes.</size>\n\nL'ordinateur de recherche est prêt.

English: @d0Navigational data can be used to upgrade the distance you can make warp jumps while piloting any capital vessel.\nA maximum of <color=#00ff00>50</color> may be turned in.\nYou currently have a <color=#00ff00>{Eden_WarpRangeVar}</color> light year increase to your base warp range. You may turn in up to <color=#00ff00>{Eden_WarpRangeMax}</color> additional navigational data.
Français: @d0Les données de navigation peuvent être utilisées pour améliorer la distance à laquelle vous pouvez faire des sauts en distorsion lorsque vous pilotez un vaisseau capital.\nUn maximum de <color=#00ff00>50</color> peuvent être restitués.\nVous avez actuellement <color=#00ff00>{Eden_WarpRangeVar}</color> année-lumière d'augmentation de votre distance de distorsion de base. Vous pouvez transformer jusqu'à <color=#00ff00>{Eden_WarpRangeMax}</color> des données de navigation supplémentaires.
@d0<color=#00ff00>{Eden_Input} Entrée des données de navigation réussie !</color>
Qu'est-ce que les données de navigation ?

English: @d0<color=#00ffff>Navigational Data:</color> A data pad containing various star charts and navigational maps. Allows a pilot to safely calculate longer warp jumps.\nIncreases the range a pilot may warp by 1 light year while piloting any warp capable capital vessel. May have a higher effect on more advanced warp drives. A maximum of 50 navigational data may be turned in. Excess may be sold.\nCan be obtained rarely in loot, missions, or bought from traders.
Français: @d0<color=#00ffff>Les données de navigation:</color> Un bloc de données contenant diverses cartes stellaires et cartes de navigation. Permet à un pilote de calculer en toute sécurité des sauts de distorsion plus longs.\nAugmente la portée de la distorsion d'une année-lumière pour un pilote de vaisseau capital capable de distorsion. Peut avoir un effet plus important sur les moteurs de distorsion les plus avancés. Un maximum de 50 données de navigation peut être rendu. L'excédent peut être vendu.\nPeut être obtenu rarement dans le butin, les missions, ou acheté auprès de commerçants.
Vous avez une demande de chanson ?

English: Can you turn off the music?
<color=#00ff00>The Fallen World</color> by Aim to Head
Français: <color=#00ff00>The Fallen World</color> par Aim to Head

English: You have a bad rep here. Get out.
Français: Vous avez une mauvaise réputation ici. Tirez-vous.

English: Fine. Don't mind if I do. Leave, that is.
Français: Bien. Ça ne vous dérange pas si je le fais. Je pars, c'est tout.

English: Welcome. Please, browse around.\nWatch out for pirate activity on your scanners, there's been an increase of attacks lately. Something is driving them to take on bigger and bigger targets.
Français: Bienvenue. S'il vous plaît, explorez les lieux.\nSurveillez l'activité des pirates sur vos scanners, il y a eu une augmentation des attaques dernièrement. Quelque chose les pousse à s'attaquer à des cibles de plus en plus grandes.
J'ai trouvé ces insignes de bandits.

English: You are no longer an enemy of the Free Colonists.
Français: Vous n'êtes plus un ennemi des colons libres.

English: How do I use the Salvage License?
Français: Comment utiliser la licence de récupération ?

English:
Laying about the yard are Salvaged Vessels. Each one has a Core Lock mechanism attached to the top of the hull that prevents unauthorized access to the salvage.
Simply purchase a Salvage License and then use the switch on the Core Lock to overload the Core Lock, allowing you to claim the vessel for yourself.
@p9You may then either place your own core on the vessel to remove whole blocks and devices, or leave it coreless and use the salvage mode of a handheld or ship mounted multitool.
Each Salvage License is single use and allows one core lock to be removed.
Attempting to salvage a locked vessel or removing the core lock by force will be met with deadly force.
Français:
Des vaisseaux de récupération traînent dans la cour. Chacun d'entre eux possède un mécanisme de verrouillage du noyau fixé au sommet de la coque qui empêche tout accès non autorisé à la récupération.
Il suffit d'acheter une licence de récupération et d'utiliser l'interrupteur du verrouillage du noyau pour le surcharger, ce qui vous permet de récupérer le vaisseau.
@p9Vous pouvez alors soit placer votre propre noyau sur le vaisseau pour retirer des blocs et des dispositifs entiers, soit le laisser sans noyau et utiliser le mode de récupération d'un multitool portable ou monté sur un vaisseau.
Chaque licence de récupération est à usage unique et permet de retirer un seul noyau de verrouillage.
Tenter de récupérer un vaisseau verrouillé ou de retirer le noyau de verrouillage par la force sera sanctionné par une force mortelle.

English: I want to ask something else.
I want to turn in a Bandit Insignia
Français: Je veux rendre un insigne Bandit.

English: I want to turn in a Raider Insignia
Français: Je veux rendre un insigne Raider.

English: I want to turn in a Death's Gate Insignia
Français: Je veux rendre un insigne de Porte de la Mort (Death's Gate)

English: @d0If you find any Bandit, Raider, or Death Hand insignias I will take them.
Français: @d0Si vous trouvez des insignes de Bandit, Raider, ou Main de la Mort (Death Hand), je les prendrai.

English: @d0Thank you for taking care of those filthy bandits! A reward of {Eden_G_BanditRewardT1} has been deposited in your bank account and word of your deeds has spread. If you have more insignias please turn them in.
Français: @d0Merci de vous être occupé de ces sales bandits ! Une récompense de {Eden_G_BanditRewardT1} a été déposée sur votre compte bancaire et la nouvelle de vos actes s'est répandue. Si vous avez d'autres insignes, veuillez les rendre.

English: @d0Thank you for taking care of those filthy bandits! A reward of {Eden_G_BanditRewardT2} has been deposited in your bank account and word of your deeds has spread. If you have more insignias please turn them in.
Français: @d0Merci de vous être occupé de ces sales bandits ! Une récompense de {Eden_G_BanditRewardT2} a été déposée sur votre compte bancaire et la nouvelle de vos actes s'est répandue. Si vous avez d'autres insignes, veuillez les rendre.

English: @d0Thank you for taking care of those filthy bandits! A reward of {Eden_G_BanditRewardT3} has been deposited in your bank account and word of your deeds has spread. If you have more insignias please turn them in.
Français: @d0Merci de vous être occupé de ces sales bandits ! Une récompense de {Eden_G_BanditRewardT3} a été déposée sur votre compte bancaire et la nouvelle de vos actes s'est répandue. Si vous avez d'autres insignes, veuillez les rendre.

English: Please help us! Our ship's life support systems have taken damage and we are in need of a <color=#00ff00>Life Support Repair Kit</color>.\nYou can create a kit in a Large or Advanced Constructor, under the Decoration tab. Please speak to me once you have the kit on you.
Français: Aidez-nous ! Les systèmes de survie de notre vaisseau ont subi des dommages et nous avons besoin d'un <color=#00ff00>kit de réparation de système de survie</color>.\nVous pouvez créer un kit dans un grand constructeur ou un constructeur avancé, sous l'onglet Décoration. Parlez-moi une fois que vous aurez le kit sur vous.

English: Thank you for your assistance! We have deposited a reward into your credit account and will make sure to let the Free Colonists know that you helped us.
Français: Nous vous remercions pour votre aide ! Nous avons déposé une récompense sur votre compte bancaire et nous ferons en sorte que les colons libres sachent que vous nous avez aidés.

English: Please help us! Our ship's propulsion systems have taken damage and we are in need of a <color=#00ff00>Propulsion Repair Kit</color>.\nYou can create a kit in a Large or Advanced Constructor, under the Decoration tab. Please speak to me once you have the kit on you.
Français: Aidez-nous s'il vous plaît ! Les systèmes de propulsion de notre vaisseau ont subi des dommages et nous avons besoin d'un <color=#00ff00>Kit de réparation de propulsion</color>.\nVous pouvez créer un kit dans un Grand Constructeur ou un Constructeur Avancé, sous l'onglet Décoration. Veuillez me parler une fois que vous aurez le kit sur vous.

English: Thank you for your assistance! We have deposited a reward into your credit account and will make sure to let the Free Colonists know that you helped us.
Français: Nous vous remercions pour votre aide ! Nous avons déposé une récompense sur votre compte bancaire et nous ferons en sorte que les colons libres sachent que vous nous avez aidés.

English: Please help us! Our ship's warp drive has taken damage and we are in need of a <color=#00ff00>Warp Drive Repair Kit</color>.\nYou can create a kit in a Large or Advanced Constructor, under the Decoration tab. Please speak to me once you have the kit on you.
Français: S'il vous plaît, aidez-nous ! Le moteur de distorsion de notre vaisseau a subi des dommages et nous avons besoin d'un <color=#00ff00>kit de réparation de moteur de distorsion</color>.\nVous pouvez créer un kit dans un grand constructeur ou un constructeur avancé, sous l'onglet Décoration. Veuillez me parler une fois que vous aurez le kit sur vous.

English: Thank you for your assistance! We have deposited a reward into your credit account and will make sure to let the Free Colonists know that you helped us.
Français: Nous vous remercions pour votre aide ! Nous avons déposé une récompense sur votre compte bancaire et nous ferons en sorte que les colons libres sachent que vous nous avez aidés.

English: Please help us! Our ship's sensors have taken damage and we are in need of a <color=#00ff00>Sensor Repair Kit</color>.\nYou can create a kit in a Large or Advanced Constructor, under the Decoration tab. Please speak to me once you have the kit on you.
Français: S'il vous plaît, aidez-nous ! Les capteurs de notre vaisseau ont subi des dommages et nous avons besoin d'un <color=#00ff00>Kit de réparation des capteurs</color>.\nVous pouvez créer un kit dans un Grand Constructeur ou un Constructeur Avancé, sous l'onglet Décoration. Veuillez me parler une fois que vous aurez le kit sur vous.

English: Thank you for your assistance! We have deposited a reward into your credit account and will make sure to let the Free Colonists know that you helped us.
Français: Nous vous remercions pour votre aide ! Nous avons déposé une récompense sur votre compte bancaire et nous ferons en sorte que les colons libres sachent que vous nous avez aidés.

English: Please help us! Our ship's weapons have taken damage and we are in need of a <color=#00ff00>Weapon Repair Kit</color>.\nYou can create a kit in a Large or Advanced Constructor, under the Decoration tab. Please speak to me once you have the kit on you.
Français: S'il vous plaît, aidez-nous ! Les armes de notre vaisseau ont subi des dommages et nous avons besoin d'un <color=#00ff00>Kit de réparation d'armes</color>.\nVous pouvez créer un kit dans un Grand Constructeur ou un Constructeur Avancé, sous l'onglet Décoration. Veuillez me parler une fois que vous aurez le kit sur vous.

English: Thank you for your assistance! We have deposited a reward into your credit account and will make sure to let the Free Colonists know that you helped us.
Français: Nous vous remercions pour votre aide ! Nous avons déposé une récompense sur votre compte bancaire et nous ferons en sorte que les colons libres sachent que vous nous avez aidés.
Je ne possède pas de kit.

English:
I understand. You can craft a kit in a Large or Advanced Constructor, under the Decoration tab of the constructor.
Or you can sometimes find a kit in an old wreck or buy one from a trader.

Once you have a kit, place it in your personal inventory then speak to me again.
Français:
Je comprends. Vous pouvez fabriquer un kit dans un Grand Constructeur ou un Constructeur Avancé, sous l'onglet Décoration du constructeur.
Ou vous pouvez parfois trouver un kit dans une vieille épave ou en acheter un à un commerçant.

Une fois que vous avez un kit, placez-le dans votre inventaire personnel puis reparlez-moi.
Je ne possède pas de kit.
Je ne possède pas de kit.
Je ne possède pas de kit.
Je ne possède pas de kit.
Je ne possède pas de kit.

English: Please help us! Our ship's life support systems have taken damage and we are in need of a <color=#00ff00>Life Support Repair Kit</color>.\nYou can create a kit in a Large or Advanced Constructor, under the Decoration tab. Please speak to me once you have the kit on you.
Français: Aidez-nous ! Les systèmes de survie de notre vaisseau ont subi des dommages et nous avons besoin d'un <color=#00ff00>kit de réparation de système de survie</color>.\nVous pouvez créer un kit dans un grand constructeur ou un constructeur avancé, sous l'onglet Décoration. Parlez-moi une fois que vous aurez le kit sur vous.

English: Thank you for your timely assistance in this matter. As an official representative of Polaris Megacorp I wish to formally complete our transaction. I have deposited what I deem to be adequate payment for the job. Polaris will also hear of how you helped save this ship.
Français: Merci pour votre assistance opportune dans cette affaire. En tant que représentant officiel de Polaris Megacorp, je souhaite officiellement conclure notre transaction. J'ai déposé ce que je considère comme un paiement adéquat pour le travail. Les Polaris entendront aussi parler de la façon dont vous avez aidé à sauver ce vaisseau.
Je ne possède pas de kit.

English: Please help us! Our ship's propulsion systems have taken damage and we are in need of a <color=#00ff00>Propulsion Repair Kit</color>.\nYou can create a kit in a Large or Advanced Constructor, under the Decoration tab. Please speak to me once you have the kit on you.

Veuillez me parler une fois que vous aurez le kit sur vous.
